Requirements You've spent at least 1 minute in mutual conversation with a creature.

Your ability to discern information about those you interact with is without peer. Spend a Mythic Point to gain a Lore skill specific to the required creature for the next 24 hours; you have mythic proficiency with that skill and can use it to Recall Knowledge about the creature, Decipher Writings created by the creature, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Earn Income] or Subsist in areas ruled by the creature, or perform other appropriate tasks as determined by the GM.
